bond.name: Knecht Ruprecht > Miss Santa
bond.value: Increases Miss Santa's skill DMG by 5%

skill.name: Impish Present
skill.value: Deals 5576/6656 DMG to an enemy (healers priority).

ability.name: Gifter of Disappointments (Lv. 30)
ability.value: Skill attacks sharply decrease target's ATK speed.

ability.name: Sinister Santa (Lv. 70)
ability.value: Skill attacks have a significant chance of inflicting Silence.
